prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Reed, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Reed, but no Strings.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Reed, but Strings are absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Reed, omitting Strings.
